createActionComponent

public ActionComponent createActionComponent(ActionComponentFrame container,
                                             java.lang.Class compClass,
                                             java.lang.String compName)
                                      throws javax.portlet.PortletException
Creates an action component of the given class assigned to the given name.

Parameters:
container - The containing action component frame
compClass - The action component class
compName - The action component name
Returns:
The action component
Throws:
javax.portlet.PortletException - If the action component cannot be created.
